snippet: Anxiety and cutthroat politics grip a nation that has known no other leader as Robert Mugabe, 92, shows increasing signs of aging, even talking about his own mortality.
abstract: Increased frailty exhibited by Pres Robert Mugabe of Zimbabwe has led to political maneuvering in anticipation of his demise and speculation over who will take his place; Mugabe has been in power for over three decades, increasing uncertainty over what will come next.

byline.original: By NORIMITSU ONISHI and HOPEWELL CHIN'ONO

lead_paragraph: Anxiety and cutthroat politics grip a nation that has known no other leader as Robert Mugabe, 92, shows increasing signs of aging, even talking about his own mortality.

headline.main: Seeing President Mugabe’s Frailty, Zimbabwe Braces for Turmoil
headline.print_headline: Mugabe’s Frailty Shows, and Power Grab Brews
